name: Deep Sea Escape
description:
You are stranded in the deepest part of the sea! You must fight your way through a hoard of creatures in order to reach your submarine and head back to the surface. Will you make it out alive?

How to play:

W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move your character.

Spacebar to interact with the fish and to progress dialogue.

Click on the buttons in the battle menu to select your action.
